mapper.insert: insert into schedule (SCH_TITLE, SCH_STARTDATE, SCH_STARTTIME, SCH_ENDDATE, SCH_ENDTIME, SCH_PARTICIPANT, SCH_PLACE, SCH_COLOR, SCH_OPEN, SCH_CONTENT ) values (#{SCH_TITLE}, #{SCH_STARTDATE}, #{SCH_STARTTIME}, #{SCH_ENDDATE}, #{SCH_ENDTIME}, #{SCH_PARTICIPANT}, #{SCH_PLACE}, #{SCH_COLOR}, #{SCH_OPEN}, #{SCH_CONTENT}, )
